description: The long trans-atlantic nightmare of Reaganothatcherite Economics is over. The Long Grey Man has fallen. There’s a not-actually-new way of doing things in town and it’s pretending, quite successfully, to look nothing like the old way at all. Noel Gallagher is about to stand up and give an incredibly cringe speech at the Brit Awards. […]
title: Goonhammer Reads Science Fiction: Only Getting Better

description: TheChirurgeon recounts his final four games at Tacoma after making the top cut and talks about making his best finish at a GW Open event to-date.
title: TheChirurgeon’s Road Through 2024, Part 22: Tacoma, Part Two

description: Atomic Mass Games held their annual Ministravaganza on July 18-20.  They had extensive news and updates for Star Wars: Shatterpoint, Marvel Crisis Protocol, and Star Wars: Legion.  In case you missed it, here is a one-stop round-up for all of the Marvel Crisis Protocol news that AMG announced during Ministravaganza.  Thursday 7/18 Hobby Room: Dark […]
title: Ministravaganza 2024 Round Up: Marvel Crisis Protocol

description: The Sylvaneth did pretty well in Age of Sigmar, with the addition of a number of new kits, as well as two Underworlds warbands that got Warcry rules. They’ve seen competitive success, often with warbands built around the very mean Kurnoth Hunters with some Dryad or Tree-Revenant chaff. They’re now getting a Warcry-specific box of […]
title: Don’t Hug the Trees – The Twistweald in Warcry

description: With Briar and Bone we see another Death warband introduced, this time for Ossiarch Bonereapers (having had them for Nighthaunt, Soulblight and Flesh Eater Courts in previous releases during second edition, two in the first year and two in the second). This time we get something more interesting, with a warband featuring a lot of […]
title: Release the Skele-Dogs – Teratic Cohort in Warcry
